title: Myo Daunt Pagoda
text: The Mawdaw Myintha Pagoda (; commonly known as Myo Daung Pagoda or Myo Daunt Pagoda (မြို့ထောင့်စေတီ)) is a Buddhist pagoda located in <a href="Shwebo">Shwebo</a>, <a href="Myanmar">Myanmar</a>. Located five kilometers northeast of <a href="Shwebo">Shwebo</a>, the pagoda was modeled after the <a href="Shwemawdaw%20Pagoda">Shwemawdaw Pagoda</a> in <a href="Bago%2C%20Myanmar">Bago</a>. It was founded by King <a href="Alaungpaya">Alaungpaya</a>, who commissioned the construction of the pagoda after his May 1757 conquest of the city. Construction took ten months.
